Manipulated the URL parameter used for fetching external content to include internal IP addresses and services, e.g. http://example.com/fetch?url=http://127.0.0.1
Confirmed presence of an SSRF vulnerability when web application fetched content from an internal IP address
Crafted a URL that would access an internal service containing the flag, e.g. http://example.com/fetch?url=http://internal-ip/path/to/flag
Submitted crafted URL, allowing web application to fetch content of the flag file from internal service
Obtained flag needed to complete challenge
